tags.name: umb-button
tags.description:
### Umbraco button 

 Usage: 

 ```html 
 <umb-button action='vm.clickButton()'></umb-button> 
 ```

 Required properties: `action`

attributes.name: action
attributes.description:
The button action which should be performed when the button is clicked. 

 Type: `string`

attributes.name: href
attributes.description:
Url/Path to navigate to. 

 Requires `type` to be set to `link` 

 Type: `string`

attributes.name: type
attributes.description:
Set the button type. 

 Options: `button`, `link`, `submit` 

 Type: `string`

attributes.name: button-style
attributes.description:
Set the style of the button. 

 Options: `block`, `danger`, `info`, `inverse`, `link`, `primary`, `success`, `warning` 

 Pass in an array to add multiple styles `[success,block]`

attributes.name: state
attributes.description:
Set a progress state on the button 

 Options: `busy`, `error`, `init`, `success` 

 Type: `string`

attributes.name: shortcut
attributes.description:
Set a keyboard shortcut for the button 

 Example: `ctrl+c` 

 Type: `string`

attributes.name: label-key
attributes.description:
Set a localization key to make a multi-lingual button 

 Example: `general_buttonText` 

 Type: `string`

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description:
Set to `true` to disable the button 

 Type: `boolean`

attributes.name: addEllipsis
attributes.description:
Adds an ellipsis character `â€¦` to the button label which means the button will open a dialog or prompt the user for more information 

 Type: `boolean`

attributes.name: showCaret
attributes.description:
Shows a caret on the right side of the button label 

 Type: `boolean`

attributes.name: autoFocus
attributes.description:
Add autoFocus to the button 

 Type: `boolean`

attributes.name: hasPopup
attributes.description:
Used to expose to the accessibility API whether the button will trigger a popup or not 

 Type: `boolean`

attributes.name: isExpanded
attributes.description:
Set to `true` to indicate that the button has expanded a collapsible element 

 Type: `boolean`

references.name: Umbraco API Docs V8 > Umbraco button directive `umbButton`
